# Home

## Column {.sidebar}


### 
```{r Select Inputs}


fileInput("file1", "Choose CSV File",
        accept = c(
          "text/csv",
          "text/comma-separated-values,text/plain",
          ".csv"))

mydata <- reactive({
    inFile <- input$file1

    if (is.null(inFile))
      return(NULL)

    data.table::fread(inFile$datapath)

  })
```


## Column {data-width=750}

### Yearly Box Plots of Magnitudes
```{r}
renderDT({
  mydata()  %>%   datatable()
    
})
```
